title: New: Shlohmo – Don’t Say No ft. How To Dress Well
content:
A brand new cut from the new Shlohmo EP, Laid Out, and featuring How To Dress Well no less, not a bad thing to wake up to.

As expected with such a featuring credit , Don’t Say No is noticeably more minimal than the blistering first effort from the EP. This cut however still has an element of malice that left such a wonderfully sour taste in the mouth after listening to debut track, Later.

Hit play below and look out for the full EP on March 5.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
